page.title: 09My Day
page.content: Once inside our classroom we line up for assembly. Then our teacher Mrs. Walsh takes us down to the hall where Sister Brendan our Headteacher is waiting. We read stories, say prayers and sing hymns. After that we come back to class and get changed for swimming lessons in the school pool. I have swum 400 metres doing backstroke. First we do a good kick to warm up then we practice lengths. When we get out we change in our school caravan and then it's playtime. After play we do maths and english until dinnertime. At dinner I have a packed lunch. In my lunch I have a peach, salad sandwiches, a chocolate biscuit and a packet of crisps. We play good games in the field like horse and animal games.
